name: Catalyst
description: Catalyst is an oscilloscope-themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. With its unique combination of traits, Catalyst brings together the precision and determination of a soldier and the curiosity and agility of a cat. Its body is designed with soldier-like arms and legs that allow it to maneuver swiftly, while its screen displays a playful cat motif that adds a touch of whimsy to its appearance. Catalyst is equipped with a sturdy helmet addon, enhancing its durability and protecting its advanced circuitry.
